short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable audio sharing when you screenshare on YouNow

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "YouNow Screen Share Extension" is a tool designed for the Chrome browser that seamlessly integrates with the YouNow platform to enhance the user experience. It allows users to share their screens effortlessly while engaging with their audience. The extension is tailored to improve interaction and engagement for broadcasters by offering an easy-to-use interface for screen sharing. With this add-on, sharing content, collaborating with guests, and providing a more immersive experience for viewers becomes straightforward, transforming live sessions into more dynamic and interactive events.
